```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of steam engine(position x), boiler(position y) and offshore pump (position z)

###Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
-  Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Iron smelting setup at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)

### Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)
Consists of:
- Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft an item. Check if the necessary resources can be crafted with the available machines. In this case, iron-plate needs to be smelted in a furnace before crafting iron-chests.
- Check the status of the furnace to ensure it has fuel and is actively smelting iron ore into iron plates.

NAMESPACE
No new functions have been defined.
```
